error.title: Error page!

http.403: You are not authorized to access this page.
http.405: The HTTP verb you used is not supported for this URL.

error.concurrencyFailure: Another user modified this data at the same time as you. Your changes were rejected.
error.proxy: Error occurred while trying to connect to the server. Please make sure the backend server is running.
error.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
error.server.not.reachable: Server not reachable. Please make sure the backend server is running on port 9000.
